  type: grid
  sort-ui: true
  sort:
    - "title asc"
#    - "date-desc"

  image-height: 150px
  image-placeholder: "../images/vincent-van-zalinge-mDohQISBnCk-unsplash.jpg"
  fields: [image, title, description, date, reading-time]
  categories: true

  page-size: 6

---

<!-- MARKDOWN COMMENT: Attempt to add submenu items for Books, Workshops, Videos, etc. -->
<script>
  document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
    var url = new URL(window.location.href);
    var category = url.hash.split('=')[1];
    if (category) {
      var listing = document.querySelectorAll('.listing-item');
      listing.forEach(function(item) {
        var categories = item.querySelector('.listing-categories');
        if (!categories || !categories.innerHTML.includes(category)) {
          item.style.display = 'none';
        }
      });
    }
  });
</script>
